{"tiddlers":{"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-special-day/readme":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-special-day/readme","text":"* Tiddlywiki Special Day * [[Source|https://github.com/oeyoews/neotw/tree/main/dev/plugins/tiddlywiki-special-day]] * [[Demo|https://oeyoews.github.io/neotw/main]] "},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-special-day/config":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-special-day/config"},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-special-day/docs/happy-new-year-2023":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-special-day/docs/happy-new-year-2023","text":"

üéâ Happy New Year 2023! üêá

"},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-special-day/example":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-special-day/example"},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-special-day/icon":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-special-day/icon","text":" "},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-special-day/macro/happy-new-year":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-special-day/macro/happy-new-year","tags":"$:/tags/Macro","text":"\define special-day(day:20230122, tiddler:"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-special-day/docs/happy-new-year-2023") <$list filter="[{$:/info/startup-timestamp}prefix]" > {{$tiddler$}} \end "},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-special-day/script":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-special-day/script","tags":"$:/tags/RawMarkupWikified/BottomBody"},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-special-day/style":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-special-day/style","tags":"$:/tags/Stylesheet"},"/home/runner/work/neotw/neotw/node_modules/tiddlywiki/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-special-day/tiddlers/ui/ui.tid":{"title":"/home/runner/work/neotw/neotw/node_modules/tiddlywiki/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-special-day/tiddlers/ui/ui.tid"}}}
